data.event: The history of Harrisburg started August 1, 1879, when the first train came rolling through the territory.

event.title: was moved to the Emory J. Darling Homestead, 1 mile south of what is now

data.event: The post office was moved to the Emory J. Darling Homestead, 1 mile south of what is now Harrisburg.
Finally in 1890, the depot was moved to its present site.
